xml_element.name: obstacle
xml_element.title: Reasons that a job start may not be allowed
xml_element.author: ss

xml_attribute.name: state
xml_attribute.title: The status of the job / task / job chain nodes

description.p: The status may be prohibiting the start.

xml_attribute.name: order_controlled
xml_attribute.title: Is the job defined as an order job?

description.p: The job is defined as an order job but is not part of a job chain.

xml_attribute.name: max_tasks
xml_attribute.title: The max.number of tasks allowed for the job

description.p: This attribute will be returned when a job cannot run because the maximum number of tasks allowed for the job has already been reached. It is always returned together with the running_tasks attribute, which provides information about how many tasks the job is running in.

xml_attribute.name: running_tasks
xml_attribute.title: Number of tasks running for a job

description.p: This attribute is returned when a job cannot start because the maximum number of tasks allowed for the job has already been reached. It is always returned together with the max_tasks attribute, which provides information about the number of tasks the job may start.

xml_attribute.name: waiting_for_process
xml_attribute.title: The job is waiting to be allocated a process

xml_attribute.name: waiting_for_process_try_again
xml_attribute.title: The job is waiting to be allocated to be allocated a process

xml_attribute.name: scheduler_state
xml_attribute.title: The status of the JobSchedulers

description.p: The JobScheduler status does not allow the job to be started.

xml_attribute.name: in_period
xml_attribute.title: The job is in its predefined time slot

description.p: The job is not in its runtime slot.

xml_attribute.name: locks_available
xml_attribute.title: (always 'false') One or more locks are not available

xml_attribute.name: process_class_is_unknown
xml_attribute.title: (immer 'true') The job process class is not known

xml_attribute.name: process_class
xml_attribute.title: The process class name

description.p: This attribute is always returned with the process_of_process_class_available attribute.

xml_attribute.name: process_of_process_class_available
xml_attribute.title: (always 'false') No more processes are available

description.p: The process class named in the process_class attribute cannot make an additional process available to start the job.

xml_attribute.name: now
xml_attribute.title: Current time (at the time of the execution of the command)

xml_attribute.name: not_ending_tasks
xml_attribute.title: The number of job tasks that have not ended

xml_attribute.name: directory_changed
xml_attribute.title: Have changes in the file system occured

xml_attribute.name: at
xml_attribute.title: The order start time

xml_attribute.name: setback
xml_attribute.title: The order has the waiting state until the time specified

xml_attribute.name: onblacklist
xml_attribute.title: The order is included in the black list

xml_attribute.name: suspended
xml_attribute.title: The order has been suspended

xml_attribute.name: is_replacement
xml_attribute.title: (always 'true') The order configuration is currently being replaced

xml_attribute.name: force
xml_attribute.title: The job will be executed immediately.

description.p: The job is being started with the force='yes' attribute.
